import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' const whatever = require('./data.json'); function Playground() { const [currentStreak, setcurrentStreak] = useState(0) const [questions, setQuestions] = useState(); var index=0 const [cardsAnswered, setcardsAnswered] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { setQuestions(whatever.questions) console.log(questions) }, []) return (

The Joy of Conversation - Level 1

Cards Answered:{cardsAnswered}
5
Current Streak:
5

How to play

  • Swipe card to the right after you both answer.
  • Swipe card to the left if you decide to skip.
Share this game:
{questions&&questions[cardsAnswered+cardrenected]}
@ours
) } export default Playground
